name: gokapi
tagline: A self-hosted file sharing app with expiring and protected links
description: Gokapi is a self-hosted file sharing app with short-lived, password-protected upload links. It focuses on privacy, simplicity, and fast linking, suitable for small team or personal workflows.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Generate file upload links that automatically expire after a set time or download count

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secure shared files with optional password requirements for access

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: No tracking or analytics, keeping file sharing simple and private

features.title: Upload Management
features.description: Control file size limits, expiration times, and download limits per link

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Quick file sharing for teams without complex permission systems

features.title: Download Tracking
features.description: Monitor how many times files have been downloaded before expiration

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Minimal, distraction-free UI for fast file sharing operations

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep shared files on your infrastructure with full control over retention
